meta.min_funds_requirement: 20,000 NZD per year (approx. 10 Lakh INR) + Tuition Fees

documents.title: Offer of Place
documents.description: Official offer letter from an approved NZ education provider.

documents.title: Tuition Fee Receipt
documents.description: Proof of payment of tuition fees (usually required before final approval).

documents.title: Financial Evidence
documents.description: Funds Transfer Scheme (FTS) is recommended for Indians. Or 6 months bank statements showing 20,000 NZD/year + Education Loan Sanction Letter.

documents.title: Police Clearance Certificate
documents.description: PCC from Passport Seva Kendra (for applicants aged 17+). Valid for 6 months.

documents.title: Medical & Chest X-Ray
documents.description: eMedical from a panel physician (required for courses > 12 months).

steps_flow.title: Get Offer
steps_flow.description: Apply to a university and receive an Offer of Place.

steps_flow.title: Medicals & PCC
steps_flow.description: Complete medical exam and obtain PCC.

steps_flow.title: Apply Online
steps_flow.description: Submit 'Fee Paying Student Visa' application via RealMe.

steps_flow.title: AIP & Payment
steps_flow.description: Receive 'Approval in Principle' (AIP), then pay tuition fees and transfer living funds (FTS).

steps_flow.title: Final Visa
steps_flow.description: Upload fee receipts to get the final E-Visa.

application_platforms.name: University Portals
application_platforms.description: Applications are submitted directly to each university's online portal.

pre_visa_steps.title: Apply for Admission
pre_visa_steps.description: Submit application and documents to the university.

pre_visa_steps.title: Pay Fees (AIP)
pre_visa_steps.description: Usually, you pay fees AFTER 'Approval in Principle' of visa, but some pay upfront.

pre_visa_steps.title: Medical & Police
pre_visa_steps.description: Prepare medical exam (chest x-ray) and police clearance.
